alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Southeast San Joaquin Valley; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 08 at 11:19PM PST until December 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SATURDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibilities as low as 200 feet in dense fog. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees expected. * WHERE...The San Joaquin Valley. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM PST Saturday morning. For the Freeze Warning, until 8 AM PST Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibilities will make driving conditions hazardous. Frost and freeze conditions may kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
